page.title: 12LEISURE IN SOUTH ELKINGTON
page.content: The major part of the area is owned by one local farmer.He maintains his land and property well and attractively and encourages the use of his land for a wide variety of leisure activities,an enlightened attitude probably untypical of his fellow landowners.The pursuits supported include{caravan {/camping club,motor cycle grass {tracking car rallying,shooting,fishing {hunting, gymkhana,team chasing,pony {club,hare coursing,rambling on {footpaths, horse riding on bridleways He welcomes the bypass over his land as it will open up the countryside for others to see.The Church Institute is available for social functions and there is the{Thursday Club}and {W.I. Three families have their own private all weather tennis courts.There is planning permission for a private indoor swimming pool at Thorpe Hall.
